characters.story: "HUNG?" the Yangtze bird questions curiously - a swan, elegant waterfowl?
"GUH!" the bird sings cheerfully - a pigeon, dove, and messenger!
"HUH!" the bird commands sharply - a crane, stork standing tall!
"YING!" the firehouse bird sings cheerfully - an oriole, singing and yellow!
"CHWEH!" the times past bird commands sharply - a magpie, chattering and black and white!
"OH!" the region bird sings cheerfully - a gull, seabird on the coast!
"YAH!" the tusk bird sings cheerfully - a raven, crow in literary form!
"UH?" the bird questions curiously - a goose, waterfowl in the velvet room?
"WOO!" the bird sings cheerfully though the top stroke is missing - a crow, black raven!
"WOO!" the mouth and crow sing cheerfully - zoom-zoom, sound onomatopoeia!
The fingers bend down drooping to pound with a pestle and crush - those hooligans cause trouble!
"YOO!" the house commands sharply - a residence, dwelling, and abode!
"YOO?" the heart questions curiously - is he pea-brained, foolish, and stupid?
The person bends down drooping - by chance, coincidental, and accidental.
"LEE!" he commands sharply - stern, severe, and strict!
"LEE!" the stern power commands sharply - to encourage, inspire, and motivate!
"GAHNG!" the metal sings cheerfully - steel, iron alloy!
The mountain ridge of hill bends down drooping - a hillock, mound for burial in Yiling.
"GAHNG!" the thread and ridge sing cheerfully - guidelines, outline, and principles!
"NEE!" the road commands sharply - to go against, oppose, and reverse the turning!
"SOO!" the water, mountain goat, and moon command sharply - to go upstream and trace back!
"SOO!" the soil commands sharply - plastic, synthetic to mold!
"GAHNG!" it sings cheerfully - a vat, vessel, and container!
"GWAN!" the tin can and stork command sharply - a jar, pot, and bottle!
"YOO!" the tin can, woods, sitting, rooster tail, crown, and Epsom salts command sharply - depressed, gloomy, and melancholy!
"YEN?" the supervise and salt shaker question curiously - salt, mineral for seasoning and necessities?
"SHYEN?" the salt shaker and everybody question curiously - salty, savory, and briny?
"TAO!" the fingers and canteen sing cheerfully - to draw out, dig, and extract money!
"TAO?" the water and canteen question curiously - to wash in a container, eliminate the humans?
"TAO?" the pinnacle and canteen question curiously - pottery, ceramic, and clay?
"YAO?" the words question curiously - a rumor, gossip that's fabricated?
"YWEN!" the crown and rabbit sing cheerfully despite injustice - wronged and accused!
"CHAN?" the food, bound up, mouth, and bunny rabbit question curiously - gluttonous, greedy, and hungry?
The fingers and hare bend down drooping - to tow, pull, and drag.
The muscle bends down drooping - to strive, endeavor, and persevere.
"SHYAHNG!" the tree and elephant command sharply - rubber tree, latex, and oak!
"YOO!" bestow and elephant command sharply - pleased, happy but hesitate!
"TUNG?" the horse questions curiously - to take flight, soar, and rise?
The stone bends down drooping - a numeral, number, and digit.
